creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: two peacocks standing side by side on tree limb URQ; peacock at front faces L, peacock in rear looks out directly at viewer; tails cropped off R edge, returning to frame LRQ; branch trails to LL with white blossoms
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
title: Peacocks Standing on a Blooming Magnolia
